Instruction: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, beat the egg yolks until they become thick. In another bowl, sift together the flour, salt, and sugar. Gradually mix the sugar mixture and milk into the egg yolks. Then, stir in the sour cream.
In a medium-sized mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until they are stiff but not dry. Gently fold the egg whites into the batter.

Heat a skillet or griddle over high heat. Add a small amount of oil, then pour approximately 1 tablespoon of batter onto the skillet and spread it out evenly. Cook the pancake until one side is browned. Flip the pancake once bubbles form on the surface and brown the other side. Continue this process with the remaining batter.
